function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of implementation of recommendations from global conferences on economic crisis","Impact":"Inability to deal with global financial and economic crises effectively","Mitigation":"Ensure the implementation of recommendations from global conferences through international cooperation and monitoring mechanisms","Technologies":"International monitoring and evaluation systems","People":"Global population","Owner":"International organizations and governments"},{"Description":"Failure to transform crisis into an opportunity for social and environmental reimagining","Impact":"Loss of societal cohesion and increased strain on social systems","Mitigation":"Implement programs and policies focused on environmental sustainability, equity, and humanitarian solidarity","Technologies":"Policy development and social programs","People":"Government officials, policymakers, and the general public","Owner":"Governments and international organizations"}]}
